Extend base S4 methods for Seurat class

Source: R/base-Seurat-methods.R
base-Seurat.Rd

Provide limited SingleCellExperiment-like method support.

# S4 method for Seurat
Gene2Symbol(object, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat,ANY
assay(x, i, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
assayNames(x, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
assays(x, ..., withDimnames = TRUE)

# S4 method for Seurat
colData(x, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat,DataFrame
colData(x) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
counts(object, assay = NULL)

# S4 method for Seurat
interestingGroups(object, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat,character
interestingGroups(object) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
logcounts(object, assay = NULL, verbose = FALSE)

# S4 method for Seurat
mapGenesToIDs(object, genes, strict = TRUE)

# S4 method for Seurat
mapGenesToRownames(object, genes, strict = TRUE)

# S4 method for Seurat
mapGenesToSymbols(object, genes, strict = TRUE)

# S4 method for Seurat
metadata(x, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
metadata(x) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
metrics(object, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
normcounts(object, assay = NULL, verbose = FALSE)

# S4 method for Seurat
organism(object)

# S4 method for Seurat
organism(object) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
reducedDim(x, type = 1L, withDimnames = TRUE)

# S4 method for Seurat
reducedDimNames(x)

# S4 method for Seurat
reducedDims(x, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
rowData(x, use.names = TRUE, ...)

# S4 method for Seurat
rowRanges(x)

# S4 method for Seurat,ANY
rowRanges(x) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
sampleData(object, clean = TRUE,
  ignoreCols = c("^description$", "^genomeBuild$", "^qualityFormat$",
  "^samRef$"), blacklistCols = c("^ident$", "^g2mScore$", "^sScore$",
  "^phase$", "^oldIdent$", "^origIdent$", "^res[0-9]+"))

# S4 method for Seurat,DataFrame
sampleData(object) <- value

# S4 method for Seurat
sampleNames(object)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
x

Object.
i

Indices specifying elements to extract or replace. Indices are numeric or character vectors, empty (missing), or NULL.

For more information:

help(topic = "Extract", package = "base")
value

Value to assign.
assay

vector(1). Assay name or index position.
verbose

logical(1). Run the function with verbose output.
genes

character. Gene identifiers.

Value

Varies, depending on the generic.

Note

Updated 2019-08-05.

See also

  • Seurat::GetAssayData().
